blogPost.excerpt: Budg is a tool to easily track your subscriptions (aka recurring expenses).
blogPost.body: Budg is a tool to easily track your subscriptions (aka recurring expenses).
blogPost.title: Budg - The tool you need to track your subscriptions
blogPost.author: Matthieu H.

localize.description: Budg是一款可以轻松跟踪您的订阅(也就是经常性费用)的工具。
localize.tagline: 跟踪您的订阅所需的工具

localize.description: Budg是一款可以輕鬆跟蹤您的訂閱(也就是經常性費用)的工具。
localize.tagline: 跟蹤您的訂閱所需的工具

previous.excerpt: When you read an email you will see a numerical score just below the subject–a score between 0 and 100. A score of 100 means the email is very easy to read and a score of 0 means the email is very difficult to read.
previous.title: Gmail inbox Readability Score - Calculating the readability score of an email

localize.description: 当你阅读一封电子邮件时，你会在主题下方看到一个数字分数-一个介于0到100之间的分数。分数100表示电子邮件非常容易阅读，分数0表示电子邮件很难阅读。
localize.tagline: 计算电子邮件的可读性分数

localize.description: 當你閱讀一封電子郵件時，你會在主題下方看到一個數字分數-一個介於0到100之間的分數。分數100表示電子郵件非常容易閱讀，分數0表示電子郵件很難閱讀。
localize.tagline: 計算電子郵件的可讀性分數

next.excerpt: imbue allows influencers to create & monetize beautiful fitness experiences while allowing you unprecedented access into the fitness routines of the influencers you know & love.
next.title: imbue - Beautiful fitness experiences with influencers.

localize.description: Inbue让有影响力的人创造美丽的健身体验并将其货币化，同时让你前所未有地接触到你认识的有影响力的人&你所爱的人的健身习惯。
localize.tagline: 与有影响力的人一起享受美丽的健身体验。

localize.description: Inbue讓有影響力的人創造美麗的健身體驗並將其貨幣化，同時讓你前所未有地接觸到你認識的有影響力的人&你所愛的人的健身習慣。
localize.tagline: 與有影響力的人一起享受美麗的健身體驗。
